definition: to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
to take a joint photo/group photo

sentences.english: X-ray examination showed a permeated destruction in the metaphysis of the bone.
sentences.chinese: 线片显示长骨干骺端不规则低密度影。

sentences.english: Its common name, to you and I, is the nightshade and it is highly poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 对我们来说，它统一的名字是夜影，它也有剧毒。

sentences.english: Most primitive people noticed a relationship between time and shadows.
sentences.chinese: 许多远古人都注意到了时间和影的关系。

sentences.english: Your face haunts my dreams like the rain at night.
sentences.chinese: 萦绕梦中，犹若夜雨，画的都是你的影。

sentences.english: Set the distance to0 so that the shadow is applied evenly around the edge of the circle .
sentences.chinese: 设置影的距离为0，得到一个均匀环绕圆圈边缘的影。

sentences.english: Set the distance to0 so that the shadow is applied evenly around the edge of the circle .
sentences.chinese: 设置影的距离为0，得到一个均匀环绕圆圈边缘的影。

sentences.english: This is no longer the shadow, mobile phone shutdown, who knows where.
sentences.chinese: 二哥早没了影，手机关机，谁也不知去了哪儿。

sentences.english: Syntectonic fibrous pressure shadows are found in the Beilin syncline, the Western Hill, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京西山北岭向斜发育同构造纤维状压力影。

sentences.english: Barium radiography showed there were filling defect, niche, bridging fold, etc.
sentences.chinese: 钡剂造影表现是充盈缺损，龛影和桥形皱襞等。

sentences.english: The patient may show an actual crater deforming indication of active disease.
sentences.chinese: 病人可以出现表现活动病变的真正龛影变形。

sentences.english: There were also slightly hypodense shadow with hazy border in the basal part of the pons.
sentences.chinese: 桥脑基底部也有稍低密度影，边缘模糊。

sentences.english: Plain film showed intestinal pseudo-obstruction sign and localized fixe gas cyst.
sentences.chinese: 平片表现假性肠梗阻征和局限性固定气囊影。

sentences.english: A fine but irregular reticular pattern is present in the lung periphery, representing intralobular interstitial thickening.
sentences.chinese: 肺外带可见明显的不规则网状影，提示小叶间质增厚。

sentences.english: Just before leaving, I and several good friends took a souvenir photo under the oriental pearl tower.
sentences.chinese: 临走时，我和几个好朋友们在东方明珠塔下留了影。

sentences.english: The cerebellar lesion (arrowhead) is of low T1 signal intensity, indicative of a cyst.
sentences.chinese: 小脑病变T1序列显示为低信号影，代表囊性病变。

sentences.english: There was still low-density shadow with sclerosis and capsule change in the natural healing group.
sentences.chinese: 自然愈合组仍为低密度影，伴硬化和囊变影。

definition: to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
rear view/figure seen from behind/view of the back (of a person or object)
(of an expanse of water) vast/distant and indistinct/tiny or insignificant
remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces
rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset
